Item.Risk_Statement: Important assets have not been clearly identified and inventoried.
Item.Description: The organization develops and maintains an inventory of its information systems.
Item.Example: The organization conducts an automated or manual inventory of information systems bi-annually.
Item.State_Implementation: The state organization develops and maintains an inventory of its information systems.
Item.Agency_Implementation: Information resource inventories are conducted on a schedule determined by the Agency business office and include all Agency-owned information resources meeting a prescribed value threshold or status as a highly pilferable item.
Item.Testing_Procedures:
Obtain Information security program policy; procedures addressing information system inventory development and maintenance; information system inventory records, other relevant documents or records and ascertain if:
(I) the organization develops an inventory of its information systems; and 
(ii) the organization maintains an inventory of its information systems.
